page.topic: How to Install Alpha Anywhere Community Edition and the Alpha Anywhere Developer Edition on the same System

discussion.p: Alpha Anywhere Community Edition and the full Alpha Anywhere Developer Edition use the same license registration mechanism. This is because Community Edition is a subset of the full Developer Edition.
To run Community Edition alongside the full Developer Edition, you need to add your license key to the installation folder for Alpha Anywhere Community Edition.

description.p: Open the folder where Alpha Anywhere Community Edition has been installed. You can find the installation folder using the Universal Installer.

figure.title: Alpha Anywhere Installer shows where products are installed.
figure.alt: Alpha Anywhere Installer listing installed products

description.p: Create a new text file and put your Community Edition license in the file.

figure.title: Add your license key to the file
figure.alt: Text editor with an example license number

description.p: Save the file as "license.key" in the Community Edition installation folder.

figure.title: Save the file as "license.key"
figure.alt: Save As file dialog with the filename set to license.key

description.p: Once the license.key file has been added, Alpha Anywhere Community Edition will use the license in the file.
